fact1000.value: PCI Biotech Holding ASA (“PCI Biotech” or “the Group” or “the Company”) is a cancer focused biopharmaceutical company headquartered in Norway and listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange. The Company is developing therapeutic products based on its proprietary photochemical internalisation (PCI) technology, which originates from world leading research at the Norwegian Radium Hospital. PCI Biotech’s lead product candidate is the photosensitiser fimaporfin (Amphinex®) and the Company has an extensive collaboration with Norwegian and international hospitals and companies.
